trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> types to UI Automation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> instance that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.List"></xref> enumeration value.

Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren"></xref>.
The collection of child elements.
Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName"></xref>.
A string that contains "ListView".
Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"></xref>.
A value in the enumeration.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the view that this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> is using.

Default <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> implementation uses the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>, and this method returns <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"></xref>.
The interface instance that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer"></xref>.
